      • getImage

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage getImage()
        Description copied from interface: Animation
        Returns the static image associated with this animation. Will typically be the ending image, but this may vary based on the animation style. This method is intended to be called when converting an animation into a static image.
        Specified by:
        getImage in interface Animation
        Returns:
